parts.text:
To determine the owner of your business profile, check your platform's settings (e.g., Facebook Business Manager, Google My Business).

Here are 3 recommendations to boost Fenty Beauty's online presence:

1.  **Create short-form video content showcasing product tutorials and behind-the-scenes glimpses.** Post these reels and TikToks consistently (3-5 times per week) to increase visibility and engagement with younger audiences.

2.  **Run interactive Q&A sessions with makeup artists or Rihanna herself on Instagram Live.** Promote these sessions in advance to maximize viewership and foster a deeper connection with your followers.

3.  **Launch a user-generated content campaign encouraging customers to share their Fenty Beauty looks using a branded hashtag.** Repost the best submissions to your official page to build community and showcase product versatility.
